segments.text: This kitchen is turning into a soggy nightmare with that overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushing everywhere, soaking the cabinets and floor—how gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is splashed, and she doesn't even care; it's filthy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's handling dirty dishes while the mess spreads unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing around in this slop, grabbing at cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool on the wet floor? They'll slip and make it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking sweets in a puddle—such a messy, undisciplined act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is open, probably attracting ants in this dampness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is clean, but inside it's a revolting disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I cringe at the thought of cleaning up all that waterlogged grime.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene just turns my stomach with its neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone turn off that faucet before it ruins everything!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ugh, the puddle widening is the worst part.
segments.speaker: PAR
